title: To My Beloved Foe
summary:
"This makes it the 562nd time I’ve killed this bastard."

Centuries ago, a monster by the name of Shinyoung cursed Dongyi with immortality. For years, he’s done nothing but wait for the perfect chance to get revenge, but killing an immortal is nearly impossible. Trapped in a twisted, endless cycle, he’s long since given up and settled into a strange form of cohabitation with his greatest enemy. But one day, when Shinyoung pushes him too far, Dongyi actually manages to kill him. Shinyoung, who always comes back laughing, doesn’t return this time.

An uneasy feeling creeps in, and Dongyi sets out to find him, only to discover that Shinyoung, for some reason, has lost all memories of him. "If you forget about me… then what happens to my revenge?!"

title: Surviving as the crown princes childhood friend
The Night Time Lady And The Doting Head Of The Family
summary:
After losing his parents, our protagonist, Yuno, lives an unfortunate life as a servant in his stepmother's household.
One day, a series of natural disasters leads to him being offered as a human sacrifice to a family of gods.

The Ciel family, a family of gods, governs the heavens and the earth and is feared for their immense power. To avoid excessive human contact, they live in a remote castle towering deep in the mountains.
Yuno becomes anxious when she hears rumors that he is an exceptionally virile man and that women are only used as a source of his power. However,
upon actually meeting the head of the family, Jupiter, she finds him to be extremely responsible and kind.

Jupiter's unfulfilled sexual desires cause natural disasters, weakening his ability to repel demons, so Yuno becomes intertwined with Jupiter as a human sacrifice. Jupiter is
in a similar situation, alone and without family, and Yuno is gradually drawn to his clumsy kindness.

The demon he has been suppressing appears, threatening the two.
What will become of their love?
Will the world be saved?

title: The Real Daughter, She Is an Almighty Boss
summary: A highly skilled fighter wakes up in someone else's body and discovers that she's the Huffmans' lost daughter Gemma, regarded as socially inferior to her adoptive sister and a human punching bag for her Aunt Elodie. Her father doesn't care about her. Her mother is ashamed of her. Just when everyone thinks Gemma is going to make a complete fool of herself, they get a slap in the face.

title: I Became the Stepmother of a Terminally Ill Child
Paradise on Earth
summary:
In search of perfect love, 16 men and women participate in the dating reality program "Paradise on Earth." With sparkling blue seas and warm sunshine 365 days a year, this place is a paradise-like island.

However, in the second week of filming, the staff members infected with an unknown virus begin to show strange phenomena, and paradise turns into hell in an instant. All contact between the island and the outside world is cut off, and rescue efforts are out of reach. Will they be able to survive to the end?

title: How to Hide the Emperor’s Child
summary:
Astelle, the empire's one-day empress brought with her a secret when she left the palace after the divorce: she was pregnant with Emperor Kaizen's child. Six years later, Astelle is living a peaceful life in the countryside with their son until the imperial guards come knocking. Kaizen requires Astelle's consent to receive the key territory of Meilen. With the empire still in turmoil from a rebellion, will Astelle be able to hide her son's identity from these threatening forces, and more importantly, from his father, the emperor?

---
“You never loved me anyway, right?”

Astelle’s long-awaited marriage life ended in a day.

She worked hard to become Kaizen’s wife since she was ten, 
however, the only thing that was left for her was a disgrace as the banished-empress.

She was abandoned by her family; 
She was kicked out by the man she loved, Kaizen.

“Yes. You’re right. I didn’t love you.”

Astelle lied for the last time. 
For the sake of the man who was her reason to live and it was also for him who was her husband for a day.

She thought there is no point tp contact with him again, but-

“I think… I might be pregnant?”

–

Six years later, Astelle, who reunited with Kaizen, lied again.

“You… who is that child?”

“He’s my nephew.”

For the sake of protecting the child.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%99%A9%EC%A0%9C%EC%9D%98-%EC%95%84%EC%9D%B4%EB%A5%BC-%EC%88%A8%EA%B8%B0%EB%8A%94-%EB%B0%A9%EB%B2%95/2881), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58647802)

* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/100859)
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%98%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%8B%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B4/316)

title: Regressor Instruction Manual
summary:
[Will you join the game?]

Giyoung's suddenly thrown into a game of life and death. Not only that, but he's also the player with the lowest stats. Still, he's got one skill on his side: the ability to read other players' status!

He finds the opportunity of his life when he discovers that Hyunsung is a returner to this world.

Now all Giyoung has to do is stick next to Hyunsung and game his way out of this tutorial.

title: Becoming the Swordmaster Rank Young Lord of the Sichuan Tang Family
summary: The Dang clan of Sacheon, once renowned for its poison and hidden weapons, is now on the path to its demise. That is, until Yeonmyeung Dang, an outcast boy of the clan, awakens by recollecting the memories of his past life as the 'god of swords' who devoted his life to mastering the sword. Will the boy be able to protect his family and fulfill his dream of living a normal life?

title: Omniscient Reader’s Viewpoint
summary: Dokja was an average office worker whose sole interest was reading his favorite web novel 'Three Ways to Survive the Apocalypse.' But when the novel suddenly becomes reality, he is the only person who knows how the world will end. Armed with this realization, Dokja uses his understanding to change the course of the story, and the world, as he knows it.

title: The Reason Why That Villainess Picked Up A Sword
summary:
“Erin, you’re truly a useless child.”

Erin suffered her entire life from the ab*se of the Marchioness and the malicious rumors she spread, until she finally died.

After two reincarnations, she returned as a genius Sword Master.

“Devil…!”

This time, everything will be different.

Erin pointed her sword at the knight who killed her in the past. She then inflicted the same pain she had experienced.

“Go ahead and wait for me.”

When everything is over, let’s meet again in hell.

***

Erin planned to disappear after changing all her fate. But why…

“I’m so sorry for blaming you without knowing anything.”

Her younger sibling who distrusted her like everyone else now extends an apologetic hand.

“How interesting. Would you consider breaking off your engagement with Ferdin and come to me?”

The First Prince, who always regarded her with contemptuous eyes, now appears to be obsessed with her.

Even her fiancé who died because of her:

“When I see you… my heart strangely aches.”

No matter how much she tries to push him away, he only draws closer.

title: Don’t Worry, We Both Agreed to this Fraudulent Marriage
summary:
Yulikian lost his parents to his uncle’s schemes to seize the throne.

Following his mother’s dying wish to survive, he frequents the slums daily to avoid his uncle’s eyes,

But he’s tormented by his inability to act despite his growing desire for revenge.

That’s when “Crazy Maddie,” a famous figure in the slums, approaches him with a sly attitude.

Although Yulikian initially wants nothing to do with her,

He has a brilliant idea after witnessing her instantly dispatch two assassins in an alley and disappear.

Yulikian grabs her wrist.

“I told you I didn’t come looking for you for bodyguard services.”

“Then what, want to date?”

“No. Marriage.”

“…What?”

“Marry me.”

“You think money can buy everything! How dare you try to buy someone’s life!”

“100 million.”

“…Sorry, could you repeat that?”

“1 billion.”

“Darling, where have you been all this time? I’ve found you.”

title: S-Class Self-Employed Person
summary: After seven long years in a fantasy world, I finally returned to the real world. Just when I thought I could enjoy some peace and quiet in normal life... Thanks to an Esper, my home vanished in an instant, leaving me with no choice but to scrape together what little money I had and start my own business. “Amazing! The highest-ranked S-class Guide has appeared!” “Huh...? Me?” I was just planning to live quietly as a café owner, but somehow, I ended up becoming an S-class Guide...?!

title: Incentive
summary:
Taekyung, the CEO of Sona Cosmetics, is a flawless and coldly rational boss.
Yuju, who had been harboring a one-sided love for him,
grows weary of being seen only as his chief secretary.
Unable to suppress her feelings any longer,
she submits her resignation after a year of silent longing.
But then...

“I forgot to give you your incentive.”
“What do you mean...?”
“I’ll give you what you want most.”
“Sorry?”
“Even if it means offering my body—your incentive.”

Without hesitation, he places his hand over her white blouse.

“But before we do this, let me make one thing clear. If you pull away again afterward, I won’t hold back next time.”

A secret temptation approaches her just as she tries to quit—<Incentive>.

title: I Think It Would Be Better For Me to Become King
summary:
Astarote is a young woman who is transported into a romance game that she loved. She takes on the role of the villain, who is married to Prince Cedric, her favorite character. However, she discovers that the end of the game is tragic for her, as she is accused of being an impostor and is executed by the king.

She tries to change her husband's destiny, making him become the new king, but in every route she ends up dying. Desperate, she decides to take radical action: she will become the queen and change the course of history. But to do so, she will have to face many obstacles, intrigues, enemies and secrets.

title: Bed Partner
summary: Still single at age 33, Haruki Shiina is standing at the biggest crossroads of her life. While unlucky in love, she's popular among her female coworkers for her laidback and boyish personality. The only one who gives her the cold shoulder is Risa Takagai, a beautiful and capable new hire who is already climbing her way up the corporate ladder. Haruki sees her as her biggest rival and is sure that the feeling is mutual, but why does Risa always seem to be watching her...?

title: The Man Is A Real Dog
summary:
In a fantasy novel, I suddenly became Astel, the younger sister who never appeared. While my brother Cassian is fighting for revenge of the clan, it is my duty to find and deal with the final villain that remains unrevealed even at the end of the series! In order to do that, I must first enter the mansion of the northern duke, where the traitors of the family are hiding. But somehow, I became the 'mate' of duke Anais, a beast and a prime candidate for the ultimate villain. Besides...

"Kiss me now, Astel."

In order to live, I have to communicate with my 'mate' every day, but there’s no such thing in the original!

"Shouldn’t we go see the ocean you like today?"

"I-I don’t think I can. I have to go see Mr. Cassian today."

The duke gritted his teeth with a cold face. I was a little scared when I saw this look on his face. Maybe he’s teething? Because he’s a wild beast!

===

The other day, when I was living under the duke’s care. My brother, Cassian, left his son in my care for a while. However, it seems the duke has been entangled in a huge misunderstanding.

"They will become our child."

"What...?"

"Cassian Gray will disappear from this world right now, so you won't be his bride anymore."

Yes...? Since when did I become Cassian Gray’s bride?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%B7%B8-%EB%82%A8%EC%9E%90%EB%8A%94-%EC%A0%9C-%EC%B9%9C%EC%98%A4%EB%B9%A0%EC%9D%B8%EB%8D%B0%EC%9A%94-%EA%B3%B5%EC%9E%91%EB%8B%98/3143), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60549099)

[Official Japanese Translation / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/126242)

title: That’s Just How First Love Is, Your Highness
summary: When a love-cursed prince becomes obsessed with a majestic black cat, he "adopts" its intimidating owner—a woman who scares alleyways just by glaring. But as her sharp tongue and mysterious past unravel, he discovers the real magic isn’t the cat... but the fierce woman who refuses to be charmed.

title: Ice Lord
summary: At the young age of twenty, Seol Mudok, a master swordsman, became the Lord of the Northern Sea Ice Palace. Plunged into despair after the death of his lover, he discovers that with the legendary flower, the “Lotus of Love,” that his deceased lover has been reincarnated. In his quest, he descends into another world…

title: I Don’t Have The Qualities to be a Saint, So I Decided to Aim to be The Last Boss!
The Hero Became The Duke’s Eldest Son
summary: No one understands why local lowlife Lord Aden Remes suddenly acts like the upright knight he was meant to be. The truth is, Aden's been possessed by Aden Albireo, the empire's hero who died after defeating the villainous Underlord and facing betrayal by his closest friends. Now, Aden's out to get revenge on those who killed him with the help of a few new allies and none other than the Underlord himself! Can Aden and his gang buckle down and power up? Or is the lord hero fated to fail once more?

title: The Lord’s Coins Aren’t Decreasing?!
summary: Aaron Steelegard's fortune was basically set as he discovered a book that allowed him to trade across dimensions—until his enemies take both his life and his riches away. But Aaron is brought back as his younger self, armed with his past knowledge and a chance at revenge! Now free to amass coins, he's gaining powerful abilities and moving up the ranks of the interdimensional trading markets. Will Aaron gain enough coins to survive this journey of vengeance and reclaim his honor?

title: The God of War is Leveling Up
summary:
Suhyeok, the greatest martial artist on the continentr, has unified the martial world. He had achieved everything, yet a lingering emptiness in his heart remained unfulfilled by his yearning for family… 

In the end, he crossed dimensions using the power of sorcery, but what lay before his eyes was...

"I was in a coma for five years in a hospital!? And what’s with this system window floating in front of me!?"

During the five years he lay unconscious, his family had been struggling to pay his hospital bills.  For his family’s sake, he needs to make money - fast and a lot of it. 

The strongest Martial God of the Hwan Continent, Suhyeok! Now Awakened, he begins his journey to level up.

title: Bloodhound’s Regression Instinct
summary: After being brainwashed by the emperor, Yahn has served him as his loyal puppet. Upon finding out that he has been played by the emperor, Yahn vows vengeance, but he falls to the mighty emperor’s powers. However, instead of dying, Yahn opens his eyes to find that he has gone back in time, to when he used to be a soldier in training. Will he now seek vengeance on the emperor, or will he go look for his family? The choice is now in his hands.

title: Now Come and Regret
summary: During his second year of high school, Haruto Otsuki starts a part-time job in housekeeping during the summer vacation. His first client turns out to be none other than Ayaka Tojo, the most beautiful girl in school! Despite being bewildered by this unexpected turn of events, Haruto continues doing his housekeeping duties. Over time, he becomes well-liked by Ayaka's family and begins regularly visiting her house. From making home-cooked meals that delight Ayaka, to going grocery shopping together like a newlywed couple, and even going on shy movie dates like young lovers, they begin to grow closer by spending these special moments outside of school.

title: Dungeon Architect
summary:
Kang Chiwoo lost his life in an accident and got reincarnated as the son of a great demon lord in another world.

Unlike his previous life as a map designer, he is now a loser named Kella.

However, in a world where magic exists and having realized the dormant power of Kella, Chiwoo sets out to achieve his goal of creating his dream map that he couldn't make in his past life...

Will Kella be able to create his own map while fending off his brothers who constantly try to kill him, the countless threats upon his life, and the pressure of those around him who want him to succeed the throne?

title: Return of the Apocalypse-Class Death Knight
summary:
Damien Haksen was once a gifted warrior with a bright future, but everything changed when a powerful Archlich twisted him into a Death Knight. Controlled by dark magic, he murdered his own family and helped destroy a kingdom. He broke free at the very end — too late to undo the damage. 

But fate gave him one more chance.

Now back in the past, Damien is determined to protect the people he once lost and destroy the dark mages who turned his life into a nightmare. This time, he’ll fight not for glory, but for love, redemption, and the future of his family.

title: Talent-Swallowing Magician
summary:
The descendant of a once great wizarding family, Elric Mervinger is unable to perform magic due to a rare medical condition.

While attempting to cure his disease, he stumbles upon the demon Mephistopheles, who tries to possess Elric to free himself from a dragon’s trap. But when Elric ends up absorbing Mephisto instead, the two become bound together.

With Mephisto by his side, will this new power allow Elric to restore his family to its former glory? Or will he just end up being devoured?

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q5aQzOSvSDw)

---

- [T.Chinese](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E5%99%AC%E9%AD%94%E6%B3%95%E5%B8%AB/399)

title: My School Life Pretending To Be a Worthless Person
summary:
The world discovered the essence of the human soul, Ideia, and found a way to materialize it. The stronger one's Ideia, the more power one has.

In a society where hierarchy is determined by this power, F-Rank Park Jinsung has always been his school's punching bag. In reality, though, he is an S-Rank with extreme bloodlust, which he has been hiding to keep others safe.

With only two years left of high school, will Jinsung be able to hide his killer side and prove rank isn't everything?

---
- [Webtoon Teaser](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RNHjCpXtHpI)

title: Starting as the Black Dragon BOSS
summary: Useless Professional Binds with the Strongest Part-Time System, Transforms into a Black Dragon BOSS Crushing Everything!

title: I Will Pay the Price for Deceiving You With My Life
summary: A master assassin, raised to kill for a "father" who wasn’t truly hers, dies by his poison then awakens in her childhood. Now, with the truth seared into her soul, she vows to turn his own game against him: "This time, I’ll be the one holding the poisoned cup." A dark tale of twisted legacies and the daughter who breaks the cycle.

title: Heavenly Demon Wants to Be A Chef
summary:
Due to a gate-related accident, Woojin regains the memories of his past life... a life as the Heavenly Demon, ruler of China! 

However, as the Heavenly Demon, there was a dream he never managed to achieve. Now, in this life, he'll do whatever it costs to fulfill his lifelong dream of becoming a chef! 

This is the legendary(?) story of Cheon Woojin, the former Heavenly Demon, chasing his dreams!

title: Healing Touch
summary:
"Sunbae, what have you been up to these last few nights?"  
  
Taeyoung, who is living with his hobae(his buddy), Junghoon, has a problem.  
He relieves himself while thinking of Junghoon every night, but can't finish.  
But what is..?! While they're drinking together, Junghoon offers to lend his hand…!

title: I am the Most Powerful Transcendent Being
summary: You know how they say “never meet your heroes”? Well, what if you’re literally about to die? Failed hunter Minato spent his entire life dreaming of becoming just like the 106 Progenitors, a heroic band of transcendents who defeated the Tower of Monsters three centuries ago, but he never expected to meet them in his dying moments when his high-school bully tries to kill and scapegoat him for looting their tomb. The Progenitors offer him a second lease on life by letting one of them take over his body, but that’s not enough for Minato: he wants them all!

title: The Delivery Man From Murim
summary: Stranded in a new world, Smiley Kang covertly lives the life of a delivery man. Until now, humanity has fended off demonic beasts and their portal “gates.” There are the Awakened, citizens imbued with supernatural abilities, and there are those more scheming, fighting to monopolize and claim demonic resources. But as the number of gates starts to rise, the world is at risk once again. Can humanity survive another onslaught of demonic beasts? The answer lies with the mysterious delivery man…

title: Unrequited Love Doesn’t End With Marriage
summary: The moment Duke Argus saved her, a refugee, Miel became a sunflower. And it’s been eight years since she earnestly buried that feeling in her heart… “Marry me.” The lord said to her, now a capable officer. “You seem to be the most steadfast.”

title: Darling, Why Do You Regret It?
summary:
I secretly met my husband's mistress. Delicate, lovely, and sweet, her name was Saira.

“I’ll never leave the Duke!”

“Now, *that’s* the spirit.”

“W-what?”

I had reincarnated as Tareia—a noblewoman with a wealthy family, beauty, and nothing to feel inferior about in life. But there was just one obstacle in my perfect plan: “Keep seducing my husband.”

I was ready to toss him aside and live a fabulous single life. 

...Or so I thought.

“I’m starting to find you fascinating.”

“Can I call you... 'Lea'?”

“My lady, please, anything but divorce.”

Why are these men suddenly acting like this?!

---
Watching on helplessly as her beloved husband carried on a whirlwind affair with a beautiful commoner, then dying tragically only to be replaced right away by that same mistress, Duchess DeLov was a pitiful figure... in the book I didn't even bother finishing! Okay, well, I'm not going to live that way. Step one: Ruin his reputation. Step two: Secure a divorce. Step three: Enjoy my happy, rich, single life! ...Step four: Fake a relationship with a handsome stranger to shake off our stalkers.

---
Tareya DeLov awakens in a novel to find herself married to the cold and aloof Duke Anteros Mel DeLov, who's cheating on her with a mistress! Appalled, she immediately petitions for divorce, hoping to keep her share of wealth and win the public's sympathy. But as the divorce comes closer to being approved, Anteros won't leave Tareya alone, remorseful and relentlessly begging her to reconsider. Will Tareya succeed in separating from her husband? And what's with Anteros' sudden shift in attitude?

title: Academy’s Reincarnated Hero
summary:
The first-generation hunter and the hero who established all monster subjugation systems and frameworks, Kim Jun-woo, finally defeats Gigantiana in the subjugation of the Black Grave Dungeon. However, he also loses his life in the process.

As his breath fades, he hears the voice of Gigantiana...

title: Infinite Mage
summary:
After Sirone was abandoned in a stable, he was found by a family of hunters and raised in a loving home. 

Despite the hardships of the peasant life, he learned how to read from a young age and became obsessed with books, especially ones on the history of magic. One day, he has an unlikely encounter with a mage and learns how to enter the "spirit zone," the first step to learning how to use magic. 

Although they say only nobles can be mages, will Sirone be able to prove his infinite potential?

title: Leveling With The Gods
summary:
“Maybe Inner Gods can never defeat Outer Gods…” so thought Yuwon Kim, a plucky, high-ranking warrior, after a bitter defeat.

But Yuwon is too tenacious to give up. His loss becomes the dawn of a new journey as a returnee. With renewed determination, Yuwon starts back from where he began, smashing monster after monster and relearning his skills before taking on the Tower once again.

But can he fight his way through the tutorials and level up once more, or will his conquest crumble before him?

---

- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xhObyLPUq6w)

title: The Max-Level Player’s 100th Regression
summary:
Earth ends up in a worldwide death game where everyone from the ages of 15 to 29 must participate.

In this 20-round death game, Ryu Min stands alone at the entrance of the last round. However, the game taunts him, killing him for having not met the entry requirement of a minimum 5-man party.

Now, on his 100th and final attempt, he uses the information he learned from his previous 99 attempts to help raise the necessary companions to reach the end. Can Ryu Min finally beat the game, or will he perish in his attempt?

title: MookHyang – Dark Lady
summary:
The exceptional martial artist and proud hierarch of the Demonic Sect, Mookhyang, winds up in a strange new fantasy realm after falling victim to a curse cast by his enemies, the Blood Sect. But when Mookhyang’s incredible control over qi, or mana, becomes known, it’s only a matter of time before he gets cursed again… and turned into a young lady?! 

In this world of elves, mages, knights, and dragons, will a mastery of Chinese martial arts be enough for one man (or woman) to fight his way back home? Or will this humbled warrior finally concede defeat? 

[Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_aBOSaO6uOk)

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%AC%B5%ED%96%A5-%EB%8B%A4%ED%81%AC%EB%A0%88%EC%9D%B4%EB%94%94/2341)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc28581)

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E5%A2%A8%E5%8A%8D%E7%95%99%E9%A6%99/59)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/31401)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/mookhyang-dark-lady-fr)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B8%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%AE%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%87_%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%8C%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B5%E0%B9%89/99)
---
- [Original Book <Yes24>](http://www.yes24.com/Product/Goods/89958058)

- [Original Book <Aladin>](https://www.aladin.co.kr/shop/wproduct.aspx?ItemId=237680077)

title: My Master Doesn’t Bite People
summary:
‘Am I going to die just trying to buy a house?!’

Lured by a high salary, maid Lucy travels all the way to a remote mansion.
Her employer? A half-dragon named Ska, infamous for being completely insane.

‘The pay includes putting up with his temper, right? That’s a pretty fair deal!’

Smashing up the house on a whim?
Kicking her out just because he hates her hair color?
As long as she treats it like a service fee, she can endure it!

But wait... when she looks closer, there’s something kind of cute about her master...
Huh? The way he looks at her is starting to change...?
No way~. Our master hates humans!

title: Entomologist In Sichuan Tang Clan
summary: Fabre, a famous million-viewer streamer known for his daring encounters with venomous creatures, is bitten by a black mamba while filming in Africa and wakes up in the mystical world of Murim. To his surprise, the jungles of Murim offer him a peaceful farming life in which he enjoys cultivating various poisonous species. But his tranquility is short-lived when he crosses paths with members of the Tang Clan, the masters of poison and devious tactics. "I see potential in you. Become a part of our family.""

title: I’m Actually a Cultivation Bigshot
summary: Li Nianfan transmigrated to an immortal cultivation world as a mortal. Knowing that he could never become a cultivator, he decided to live an ordinary life. But unbeknownst to him, his dog became a mighty Yaoguai king by watching him draw and write; the tree he planted in the backyard became the tree of the world by listening to tunes he played; a passerby he met, who gained enlightenment from the chitchat with him, became a Taoist sage and started a new era...

title: White Moon He Made a Move On Me
summary: A sassy, drop-dead gorgeous heiress clashes with the refined, high-and-mighty CEO, Mr. Bao Jinlan. Jiang Yaoyao had a secret crush on Bao Jinlan for ages, being super cautious and discreet about it, until one day, she woke up in a hotel room with him sleeping right next to her... And then, she somehow became Bao Jinlan's fiancée. Nobody dared to mess with her in the Jiang family anymore, and the big shots in the city's social scene respected her to no end. Everywhere she went, the youngsters would call her 'Big Sis,' and Mr. Bao? Well, he suddenly got addicted to being around her.

title: It’s Annoying Because My Childhood Friend Is An Archmage
summary: A cynical noblewoman cursed to hear others' thoughts struggles to control her childhood friend—a wildly powerful mage whose flirting is as explosive as his unchecked magic. His outrageous marriage proposals ("I'll conquer the empire for you!") and her exasperated damage control create a hilarious magical rom-com where keeping him sane might just drive her mad first.

title: Rejecting The Perfect Marriage
summary:
The Tezen ducal family, wielding the utmost power, and O’Hara County, possessing all the wealth in the world—their union could not have been more perfect than this.

Except there was no burning love.

“Evangeline O’Hara is a prepared duchess. It would be troublesome to find another woman now, and there is no guarantee that she would do as well as Evangeline.”

For Dekarno, there was no Duchess better than her.

So, if it was only about bankruptcy, he could bear with it.

However, she couldn’t.

“Let’s put an end to this, now.”

“…Are you suggesting canceling the engagement?”

“Yes.”

Evangeline had given up everything she had brought so far and now walked away barehanded.

By relinquishing everything, she could let go of that man, too.

Even the feelings she had held alone.

“I liked you, Your Grace.”

“….”

“No way. Your Grace didn’t think I was only coveting the position of Duchess, did you?”

How could she leave so easily after claiming she liked him? Dekarno couldn’t understand, and his anger boiled inside.

The increasingly entangled events, the complicated thoughts—all of it traced back to that woman.

In the end, there was no choice but to put everything back in its place.

He set out to find Evangeline, who was desperately trying to stand on her own.

“You claim you’ll survive. It’s unbearable for a mere human like me to endure.”

title: It’s Finally Love, Demon Lord!
summary:
A work packed with stories that make you cry, smile, and heal. A compilation of original short stories, including commercial oneshots and manga previously published on Twitter or Pixiv.

List of Stories (in **bold** = scanlated):

1. **Welcome to the Departed Spirit Funeral Home (Oneshot)** (ようこそ亡霊葬儀屋さん (読切版)): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/72034786), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1394956053461315585).
One-shot version of *[Youkoso Bourei Sougiya-san](https://mangadex.org/title/99f1aa23-d9b5-432f-ba51-591985f76607/)*.

2. **Welcome to the Departed Spirit Funeral Home - After Story** (一描き下ろし後日話)
A newly drawn after story of *[Youkoso Bourei Sougiya-san](https://mangadex.org/title/99f1aa23-d9b5-432f-ba51-591985f76607/)*.

3. **My Childhood Friend Is a Crybaby** (俺の幼馴染みは泣き虫だ): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/79083715), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1374662950787551232).

4. **Four Patterns of Love** (4つの恋模様): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89467880).

5. **The God of Pestilence Picked up by Humans** (人間に拾われた疫病神): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/88553623), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1372125964876931075).

06. **To You at 17** (17歳のキミへ。): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/79817585), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1217750845460058112).
A mysterious high school girl appeared and sent letters to Mirai.

7. **Just an Office Lady Eating Ramen** (OLさんがラーメンを食べるだけ): Original on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1414132353115426816).

8. **Seeing the Sea With an Angel** (天使と一緒に海を見る): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89166096), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1382272880931532804).

9. **WORLD END WANKO**: Original on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1512347577408053250?cxt=HHwWhICjhfyG-PwpAAAA).

10. **The Tired Office Lady's One Comfort in Life** (佐藤さんと鬼上司天野さん): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/75086414), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1384809850538917895).

11. **The Story of a Cat That Has Lived for 100 Years** (100年生きた猫の話): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89015686), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1464174470495498249).
This is a story of a cat that has become immortal, wandering through the course of its lifetime to find happiness.

12. **Shimono-kun's Quiet Girlfriend** (無口な下野くんの彼女): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/88224680), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1367052638500495360).

13. **The Demon Lord Defeated by the Hero and the Slave Girl** (勇者に敗れた魔王と奴隷少女): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/88878648), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1377199075192303618).

14. **The Boy Who Had Grown to Hate Manga** (漫画が嫌いになった少年): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89807719), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1392419305199788032).
